thread.title: Margaret
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Margaret

author: Margaret
title: Margaret
text: I was in your store on Tuesday Feb 21, 2017 and I had this nice young gentleman come and ask if I needed assistance and I told him I was into purchase a chair I had viewed on our local TV station and he said they were all gone, however he had one left in stock that had a leg that was not stable I then asked to look at the chair and to the best of my knowledge it just had the screw missing that was suppose to hold the chair together so I purchased it, its stands on its own so no lost support when you sit in it, hats off to Chris at Homezone I will make this my furniture store.
